articles.title: Wallabies defeat Argentina in final game of Rugby Championship, Andrew Kellaway hat-trick
articles.description: Classy back Andrew Kellaway scored a hat-trick of tries as the Wallabies finished their Rugby Championship campaign with a 32-17 win over Argentina on Saturday night.
articles.content:
An Andrew Kellaway hat-trick inspired the Wallabies to their fourth consecutive win at Cbus Super Stadium on Saturday evening.
Classy back Andrew Kellaway scored a hat-trick of tries as the Wallabies finished their Rugby Championship campaign with a ... [3047 chars]

articles.title: Kellaway stars as Wallabies beat Argentina
articles.description: Andrew Kellaway is on the cusp of breaking Israel Folau's record for most Wallabies tries in a debut season after crossing three times in a win over Argentina.
articles.content:
An Andrew Kellaway hat-trick has him within reach of Wallabies history after a 32-17 defeat of Argentina gave them four-straight Rugby Championship Test wins for the first time.

articles.description: It has been confirmed that the goalkeeper will be able to face Wolves after representing Argentina during the international break but the 29-year-old faces playing two games in two days.

articles.title: Match Report - Argentina 17 - 32 Australia
articles.description: Winger Andrew Kellaway scored three tries as Australia finished the Rugby Championship on a high, ensuring Argentina's tumultuous, months-long tour ended without a victory in six Tests.

articles.title: Soccer-Dybala out of Argentina squad due to injury
articles.description: Dybala missed Wednesday's 1-0 Champions League win over Chelsea and Juventus expect him to be available after the international break. Argentina are second in the South American qualifying group for the 2022 World Cup, with five wins from eight games.
articles.content: Juventus forward Paulo Dybala has been ruled out of Argentina's squad for this month's World Cup qualifiers due to injury, the country's soccer governing body said. Dybala was initially included in coach Lionel Scaloni's squad announced on Monday but... [686 chars]
